name: deli tray
description: A plastic deli tray with a fitted transparent plastic lid. Commonly used to display and transport individual meals such as sandwiches and chow mein.

name: deli platter
description: A round plastic deli platter with a tall fitted transparent plastic lid. Normally used for larger displays like cheesecake and samplers.

name: rigid plastic case
description: A large, rigid plastic case normally used to store 30 day emergency food supplies or cat litter.

name: plastic tub
description: A wide-mouthed plastic tub with a screw-on lid. Normally used for storing dry powder.

name: large plastic cup
description: A clear plastic cup with a wide mouth and fitted lid. Normally used for holding individual deli soup and salad servings.
